PHRASE.LANG: What's that smell? This audible version of the Fartinator 8000 is the opposite of "silent but deadly", as nearby users will hear every bodily function you can muster. [#Legal]

Quelle est donc cette odeur ? Cette version audible du Flatulinator 8000 est tout l'opposé de "silencieux mais mortel". Les utilisateurs alentour entendront la moindre de vos fonctions corporelles. [#Legal]
Was stinkt hier so? Diese hörbare Version des Furzomat 8000 ist das Gegenteil von "Lautlos aber tödlich", da Spieler in deiner Nähe jede deiner stinkenden Körperfunktionen hören will. [#Legal]

Cos'è questo odore? La versione sonora dello Scorreggiatore 8000 è tutto l'opposto di "silenzioso ma letale": tutti gli utenti nelle vicinanze potranno udire ogni singolo movimento del vostro intestino. [#Legal]

¿Qué es ese olor? Esta versión audible del Pedonator 8000 es lo contrario de "silencioso pero mortal", ya que los usuarios que estén cerca podrán escuchar toda función corporal que puedas expulsar. [#Legal]
What's that smell? This audible version of the Fartinator 8000 is the opposite of "silent but deadly", as nearby users will hear every bodily function you can muster. [#Legal]
What's that smell? This audible version of the Fartinator 8000 is the opposite of "silent but deadly", as nearby users will hear every bodily function you can muster. [#Legal]
